fuel_constants.comment_fuel: Stop-go idle fuel consumption multiplier and CO2 emission factor

economic_constants.comment_economic: Opportunity cost of time (not currently used in leakage calculation)

data_validation.comment_validation: Sanity guard: fuel price must be between 4-12 ILS/L (fail-closed if outside range)

source_cadence.comment_cadence: Cache TTLs for live data sources

canonical_schema.comment_schema: Canonical keys enforced by methodology.py and sources/*.py
